privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: At Fanatikoin, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you register on our platform, express interest in obtaining information about us or our products, or otherwise contact us. The personal information we collect may include your name, email address, wallet address, and any other information you choose to provide. We may also collect information automatically when you use our platform, including IP address, browser type, device information, and usage data.

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our platform; to process transactions and send related information; to respond to your comments, questions, and requests; to send you technical notices, updates, security alerts, and support messages; to personalize your experience; to monitor and analyze usage patterns; and to detect, prevent, and address technical issues. We may also use your information to communicate with you about products, services, offers, and events, and provide other news or information about Fanatikoin and our partners.

sharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
sharing.content: We do not share, sell, rent, or trade your personal information with third parties for their commercial purposes, except as described in this Privacy Policy. We may share your information with third-party service providers who perform services on our behalf, such as payment processing, data analysis, email delivery, hosting services, and customer service. We may also share your information as required by law, such as to comply with a subpoena or similar legal process, or when we believe in good faith that disclosure is necessary to protect our rights, protect your safety or the safety of others, investigate fraud, or respond to a government request.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We have implemented appropriate technical and organizational security measures designed to protect the security of any personal information we process. However, despite our safeguards and efforts to secure your information, no electronic transmission over the Internet or information storage technology can be guaranteed to be 100% secure, so we cannot promise or guarantee that hackers, cybercriminals, or other unauthorized third parties will not be able to defeat our security and improperly collect, access, steal, or modify your information.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our platform and hold certain information. Cookies are files with a small amount of data which may include an anonymous unique identifier. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our platform.

rights.title: Your Privacy Rights
rights.content: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information, such as the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information, the right to restrict or object to our processing of your personal information, and the right to data portability. To exercise these rights, please contact us using the contact information provided below.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@fanatikoin.com or by mail at Fanatikoin, 123 Blockchain Avenue, Silicon Valley, CA 94025, United States.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to the most common questions about Fanatikoin and fan tokens.

what.question: What are fan tokens?
what.answer: Fan tokens are digital assets built on blockchain technology that give sports fans access to a variety of benefits related to their favorite teams. These benefits may include voting rights on certain team decisions, exclusive merchandise, special experiences, and more. On Fanatikoin, fan tokens are built on the Chiliz blockchain, providing security, transparency, and ownership verification.

how.question: How do I purchase fan tokens?
how.answer: To purchase fan tokens on Fanatikoin, you'll need to connect a compatible Web3 wallet like MetaMask or use our integrated Web3Auth solution for social logins. Once connected, you can browse available tokens in our marketplace, select the quantity you wish to purchase, and complete the transaction using CHZ (Chiliz) tokens. The platform fee is 2.5%, and the tokens will be transferred directly to your wallet after purchase.

benefits.question: What benefits do fan tokens provide?
benefits.answer: Fan tokens provide various benefits depending on the team. Common benefits include: voting rights on certain team decisions (like jersey designs or match music), access to exclusive content, discounts on official merchandise, chances to win match tickets, VIP experiences, and participation in exclusive events. Each team token lists its specific benefits on its token page.

buy.question: Do I need cryptocurrency to buy fan tokens?
buy.answer: Yes, fan tokens on Fanatikoin are purchased using CHZ (Chiliz), the native cryptocurrency of the Chiliz blockchain. You can acquire CHZ through various cryptocurrency exchanges and then transfer them to your connected wallet. We're also working on implementing gasless transactions through Biconomy to make the purchase process smoother for users new to blockchain technology.

secure.question: How secure are fan tokens?
secure.answer: Fan tokens on Fanatikoin are built on the Chiliz blockchain, which uses proven security protocols. The ownership of tokens is recorded on the blockchain, making them secure and tamper-proof. Your tokens are stored in your personal wallet, which only you have access to through your private keys or seed phrase. We recommend using hardware wallets for additional security when storing significant amounts of tokens.

wallet.question: Which wallets are compatible with Fanatikoin?
wallet.answer: Fanatikoin supports various Web3 wallets including MetaMask, WalletConnect-compatible wallets, and Socios.com wallet. We also offer Web3Auth integration, allowing you to log in using social accounts like Google, Facebook, or Twitter without needing to manage a traditional crypto wallet. All wallets must be configured to work with the Chiliz blockchain (Chain ID: 1001 for Spicy Testnet).

sell.question: How can I sell my fan tokens?
sell.answer: You can sell your fan tokens directly on the Fanatikoin marketplace. Simply connect your wallet, navigate to 'My Tokens', select the tokens you wish to sell, specify the quantity, and confirm the transaction. You can also participate in auctions to potentially sell tokens at premium prices. The proceeds from sales will be credited to your wallet in CHZ tokens.

biconomy.question: What is Biconomy integration?
biconomy.answer: Biconomy integration on Fanatikoin enables gasless transactions, meaning you can interact with the platform without having to pay gas fees for every transaction. This technology uses meta-transactions and account abstraction to create a more user-friendly experience, especially for those new to blockchain. We're currently implementing this feature to improve accessibility and reduce friction in the user experience.

meta.title: Blockchain Glossary
meta.description: Learn the key terms and concepts related to blockchain technology, fan tokens, and the Fanatikoin platform.
meta.keywords: blockchain glossary, crypto terms, Web3 terminology, fan tokens, Chiliz, Fanatikoin

glossary.title: Blockchain Glossary
glossary.description: Understanding the terminology used in the blockchain and fan token ecosystem.

blockchain.definition: A distributed digital ledger that records transactions across many computers so that the registered transactions cannot be altered retroactively. This technology is the foundation of cryptocurrencies and fan tokens.

wallet.definition: A digital tool that allows users to store, manage, and interact with their cryptocurrencies and tokens. Wallets can be software-based (like MetaMask) or hardware devices (like Ledger or Trezor).

privateKey.definition: A secret number that allows cryptocurrencies to be spent. Anyone with access to a wallet's private key has control over the funds within it. It should never be shared with others.

publicKey.definition: A cryptographic code that enables users to receive cryptocurrencies into their accounts. It is derived from the private key but does not reveal it. It can be safely shared with others.

gas.definition: The fee required to conduct a transaction on a blockchain network. Gas fees compensate miners or validators for the computing energy required to process and validate transactions.

gasless.definition: A method that allows users to interact with blockchain applications without directly paying gas fees. On Fanatikoin, we implement this through Biconomy integration to improve user experience.

smartContract.definition: Self-executing contracts with the terms directly written into code. They automatically enforce and execute agreements when predetermined conditions are met, without the need for intermediaries.

token.definition: A digital asset that represents a certain value or utility within a specific ecosystem. Fan tokens are a type of utility token that provide benefits related to sports teams.

fanToken.definition: A type of utility token that gives holders access to various benefits related to sports teams, such as voting rights, exclusive merchandise, and special experiences.

chiliz.definition: The native cryptocurrency of the Chiliz blockchain, used for transactions on the Fanatikoin platform. CHZ is the currency used to purchase fan tokens.

web3.definition: The third generation of internet services, characterized by decentralization and token-based economics. Web3 applications like Fanatikoin operate on blockchain technology and emphasize user ownership of data and digital assets.

web3auth.definition: An authentication solution that allows users to access Web3 applications using familiar social logins (Google, Facebook, etc.) without needing to manage complex private keys or seed phrases.

biconomy.definition: A Web3 infrastructure that enables gasless transactions and simplified user onboarding for blockchain applications. Fanatikoin integrates with Biconomy to provide a smoother user experience.

nft.definition: A unique digital asset that represents ownership of a specific item or piece of content. Unlike cryptocurrencies, each NFT has distinct properties and cannot be exchanged on a one-to-one basis.

defi.definition: A blockchain-based form of finance that doesn't rely on central financial intermediaries such as banks. DeFi platforms allow users to lend, borrow, and trade assets directly with each other.

dao.definition: An organization represented by rules encoded as a computer program that is transparent, controlled by organization members, and not influenced by a central government.

metamask.definition: A popular cryptocurrency wallet and gateway to blockchain applications. It allows users to store Ethereum and other tokens, and interact with decentralized applications through a browser extension or mobile app.

walletConnect.definition: An open protocol that allows users to connect their mobile cryptocurrency wallets to decentralized applications by scanning a QR code. It enables secure interaction between wallets and dApps.

chainId.definition: A unique identifier for a blockchain network. The Chiliz Spicy Testnet, which Fanatikoin uses for development and testing, has a Chain ID of 1001.

rpc.definition: A protocol that allows a program to request a service from another program located on another computer or network. In blockchain, RPC URLs are used to connect wallets to specific networks.
